page.title: 19Secondary Sch.Teacher's Day
page.content: Most of my work involves running a scheme called "Enquiry" which integrates ideas and materials from many disciplines.I also teach English. 9:00 Register a 4th year class. 9:25 Double lesson with 6th Form set on poems of Seamus Heaney. 10:35 Break.I talk to English staff. 10:55 Second lesson with 6th Form on short stories of D.H.Lawrence. 12:05 Lunch.Over my sandwiches I write introduction to year 2 booklet on Victorian poetry. 1:15 teaching as part of a team for 6th Form General Studies Scheme. 2:35 Free double period. 4:15 I go home.After eating,then marking and preparing,I try to take break with my family,but Literature is time consuming and today I am working until late.
